content: आव्यध् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To hit, pierce; see अनाविद्ध. {@--2@} To wound. {@--3@} To break or pierce through. {@--4@} To put on; <ls>Bk. 20. 11</ls>. {@--5@} To shoot at, throw or cast towards. {@--6@} To throw away, cast off. {@--7@} To wave, brandish. {@--8@} To pin on. {@--9@} To rouse, agitate, stir up. {@--10@} To drive away, expel; निर्बंधमाविध्यति <ls>Mv. 5. 39.</ls>
